Title: Relates to the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons from the United States government
Summary: Relates to the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons from the United States government; prohibits participation in the 1033 federal excess property program; provides exceptions.
LawCode: Amd §212, add §837-y, Exec L; amd §656, County L; amd §150, Town L; add §4-a, Chap 360 of 1911
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the county law, the town law and chapter 360 of the laws of 1911 relating to police in certain municipalities, in relation to the transfer, acceptance, or purchase of military weapons from the United States government
